title: PRAY, Brian Sep 5, 1959 - Dec 26, 2023
text:
Brian Charles Pray, 64, of Liberty Street, Keeseville, passed away Tuesday, Dec. 26, 2023, at the Essex Center in Elizabethtown.
He was born in Plattsburgh, Sept. 5, 1959, the son of William and Viola (Rock) Pray.
Brian was a lifelong resident of the North Country and the Adirondacks where he enjoyed fishing, hunting, and gardening. His greatest passion was time spent with family.
Left to cherish the memory of Brian are, his daughter, Hillary Pray; siblings, Robin Pray of Peru, Russell (Linda) Pray of Keeseville, Charlene Gondal of Plattsburgh, Cindy Pray of Keeseville, Brenda (Darwin) Nolan of Portland, Ore., Joe (Rebecca) Pray of Keeseville, and Daniel (Dawn) Pray of Keeseville; and numerous nieces and nephews.
In addition to his parents, he was predeceased by a daughter, Brianna Pray; sister, Pam; and brothers, Bill, Allan and Alfred.
Calling hours will be held Saturday, Dec. 30, 2023, from 2 to 4 p.m. at the Hamilton Funeral Home in Peru, 294 Mannix Road, Peru. A funeral service will follow at 4 p.m. in the Hamilton Funeral Home Chapel. Burial will be held at the convenience of the family in the Evergreen Cemetery in Keeseville.
Donations in memory of Brian Charles Pray may be made to St. Jude Children's Research Hospital.
Arrangements are in the care of the Hamilton Funeral Home, 294 Mannix Road, Peru, 643-9055. To make a floral purchase, offer an online condolence, share a symbolic gesture, or share a photo in memory of Brian Pray please visit
www.hamiltonfuneralhome.com

Plant a tree: How does it work
When your purchase is complete, a post will be made on the tribute wall of the deceased signifying the planting of a memorial tree.
An official certificate recognizing your purchase will be included with your email receipt. You can then forward the email to the family or print it and give it to them personally.
After an order is placed, our forestry partners will plant the tree in the area of greatest need (nearest the funeral home), according to the planting schedule for the year.
Due to seasonal conditions, the tree planting takes place during the spring and summer.
Tree Planting Timeline
Orders placed in:
January - May
Planting will take place in Spring or Summer of the same year.
June - December
Planting will take place in Spring of the following year.
